data.name: KoboldKare Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official KoboldKare Soundtrack!

Enjoy 14 tracks of relaxing ambient electronic music. Perfect beats to care for kobolds to. It doesn't sound much like porn, but hey, it sounds pretty nice anyways.
data.about_the_game:
The official KoboldKare Soundtrack!

Enjoy 14 tracks of relaxing ambient electronic music. Perfect beats to care for kobolds to. It doesn't sound much like porn, but hey, it sounds pretty nice anyways.
data.short_description: Ambient beats to care for kobolds to.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 81 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 277 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Track 3 has a sexual term in it's name, and the name of the album advertises the existence of an adult sex game. However, the music itself does not have lyrics and is ironically completely appropriate.
